腜腜腜

腜字的基本解释

腜
méi
〔腜腜〕肥沃，如“腜腜垧野，奕奕菑亩。”
妇女开始怀孕的征兆。

腜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méi］
［《廣韻》莫杯切，平灰，明。］
见“腜腜”。

腜字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　腜； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页987第28
【唐韻】莫杯切【集韻】謨杯切，?音梅。【說文】婦始孕，腜兆也。【博雅】腜，胎也。　又【博雅】腜腜，肥也。　又美也。【左思·魏都賦】腜腜坰野。【註】腜腜，美也。

腜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
腜字的起名意思

暂无。

Simmer
Basic explanation of words
Simmer
méi
〔腜腜〕It is fertile, such as "Wild, Yiyiyimu."
Signs that women are beginning to become pregnant.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méi］
["Guangyun" Mo cup cut, flat gray, bright. ]
See "腜腜".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　腜; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 987 28
[Tang Yun] Mo cup cut [Ji Yun] Mo cup cut,? Yinmei. [Said the text] A woman is pregnant, and it is a sign. [Bo Ya] Pork, fetus too.　[Bo Ya] again, fat and fat.　It's beautiful. [Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu] You are wild. [Note] Poisonous, beautiful.
